extracted_text:
On August 23, 2025, the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) approved Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation's (SMBC) plan to acquire up to a 24.99% stake in Yes Bank . Kotak Mahindra Bank was listed as one of the shareholders that would sell its stake as part of this deal.

Corporate development for KOTAKBANK Ltd on August 23, 2025:

<<<<<<< HEAD
The RBI's approval of the SMBC-Yes Bank deal is a significant corporate development for Kotak Mahindra Bank because the bank was one of seven lenders offloading shares as part of the secondary purchase. The SMBC stake purchase, following an initial plan to raise its holding to 20%, involved Kotak and other institutional shareholders.
